languages.text: {n}Веки существа распахиваются, обжигая неестественным свечением желтых зрачков. Безобразные губы кривятся, растягивая улыбку все шире, и шире... И тонкая кожа разрывается с треском, обнажая ряды острых зубов.{/n} "К'хо мр'даш'нг ро фнагл хепт!" {n}Извращенный утробный голос вырывается из глотки существа, и оно заходится смехом.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Веки существа распахиваются, обжигая неестественным свечением желтых зрачков. Безобразные губы кривятся, растягивая улыбку все шире, и шире... И тонкая кожа разрывается с треском, обнажая ряды острых зубов.{/n} "К'хо мр'даш'нг ро фнагл хепт!" {n}Извращенный утробный голос вырывается из глотки существа, и оно заходится смехом.{/n}
traits.speaker: HaloDevice_Noble

languages.text: {n}The creature's eyelids flutter open, searing you with the unnatural glow of its yellow pupils. The disfigured lips twist, stretching the smile wider and wider... Until the thin skin bursts with a sharp snap, revealing row after row of pointed teeth.{/n} "K'ho mr'dash'ng ro fnagl hept!" {n}A twisted, guttural voice bursts from the creature's throat, and it roars with laughter.{/n}

И тонкая кожа разрывается с треском, обнажая ряды острых зубов.{/n} "К'хо мр'даш'нг ро фнагл хепт!" {n}Извращенный утробный голос вырывается из глотки существа, и оно заходится смехом.{/n}

traits.speaker: HaloDevice_Noble

languages.text: {n}生き物の瞼が開き、黄色い瞳孔の不自然な輝きが脳裏に焼き付く。醜い唇が歪み、その笑みはだんだんと大きなものになり…薄い皮膚が破れて何本もの鋭い歯が露わになった。{/n}「コー・ムル・ダッシュン・ロー・フナグル・ヘプト！」{n}その生き物の喉から、歪んだ、耳障りな声が炸裂し、笑い声が轟く。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The creature's eyelids flutter open, searing you with the unnatural glow of its yellow pupils. The disfigured lips twist, stretching the smile wider and wider... Until the thin skin bursts with a sharp snap, revealing row after row of pointed teeth.{/n} "K'ho mr'dash'ng ro fnagl hept!" {n}A twisted, guttural voice bursts from the creature's throat, and it roars with laughter.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}生き物の瞼が開き、黄色い瞳孔の不自然な輝きが脳裏に焼き付く。醜い唇が歪み、その笑みはだんだんと大きなものになり…薄い皮膚が破れて何本もの鋭い歯が露わになった。{/n}「コー・ムル・ダッシュン・ロー・フナグル・ヘプト！」{n}その生き物の喉から、歪んだ、耳障りな声が炸裂し、笑い声が轟く。{/n}
traits.speaker: HaloDevice_Noble

languages.text: {n}Los ojos de la criatura se abren, revelando un brillo amarillento abrasador. Sus labios deformes se tuercen, haciendo que la sonrisa se ensanche más y más... hasta que la piel se rompe con un chasquido, revelando una hilera de dientes tras otra.{/n} «¡K'ho mr'dash'ng ro fnagl hept!». {n}Una voz retorcida y gutural brota de la garganta de la criatura, que ríe a carcajadas.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The creature's eyelids flutter open, searing you with the unnatural glow of its yellow pupils. The disfigured lips twist, stretching the smile wider and wider... Until the thin skin bursts with a sharp snap, revealing row after row of pointed teeth.{/n} "K'ho mr'dash'ng ro fnagl hept!" {n}A twisted, guttural voice bursts from the creature's throat, and it roars with laughter.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Los ojos de la criatura se abren, revelando un brillo amarillento abrasador. Sus labios deformes se tuercen, haciendo que la sonrisa se ensanche más y más... hasta que la piel se rompe con un chasquido, revelando una hilera de dientes tras otra.{/n} «¡K'ho mr'dash'ng ro fnagl hept!». {n}Una voz retorcida y gutural brota de la garganta de la criatura, que ríe a carcajadas.{/n}
traits.speaker: HaloDevice_Noble

languages.text: {n}怪物颤动着睁开眼睛，浑浊的黄色瞳孔放射出不自然的光彩。畸形的嘴角不断向两边延伸、延伸，直到薄薄的嘴唇突然裂开，露出一排排尖利的牙齿。{/n}“K'homr'dash'ngrofnaglhelp!”{n}它的喉咙里迸射出扭曲喑哑的声音，紧接着又是一串大笑。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The creature's eyelids flutter open, searing you with the unnatural glow of its yellow pupils. The disfigured lips twist, stretching the smile wider and wider... Until the thin skin bursts with a sharp snap, revealing row after row of pointed teeth.{/n} "K'ho mr'dash'ng ro fnagl hept!" {n}A twisted, guttural voice bursts from the creature's throat, and it roars with laughter.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}怪物颤动着睁开眼睛，浑浊的黄色瞳孔放射出不自然的光彩。畸形的嘴角不断向两边延伸、延伸，直到薄薄的嘴唇突然裂开，露出一排排尖利的牙齿。{/n}“K'homr'dash'ngrofnaglhelp!”{n}它的喉咙里迸射出扭曲喑哑的声音，紧接着又是一串大笑。{/n}
traits.speaker: HaloDevice_Noble

languages.text: {n}La créature ouvre les yeux et vous lance un regard brûlant de ses inquiétantes pupilles jaunes. Ses lèvres déformées se tordent encore plus pour former un large sourire qui ne cesse de grandir... jusqu'à ce que sa peau se déchire dans un grand craquement, révélant des rangs entiers de dents acérées.{/n} « K'ho mr'dash'ng ro fnagl hept ! » {n}Une voix gutturale dénaturée émane de la gorge de la créature, qui pousse ensuite un grognement ressemblant à un éclat de rire.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The creature's eyelids flutter open, searing you with the unnatural glow of its yellow pupils. The disfigured lips twist, stretching the smile wider and wider... Until the thin skin bursts with a sharp snap, revealing row after row of pointed teeth.{/n} "K'ho mr'dash'ng ro fnagl hept!" {n}A twisted, guttural voice bursts from the creature's throat, and it roars with laughter.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La créature ouvre les yeux et vous lance un regard brûlant de ses inquiétantes pupilles jaunes. Ses lèvres déformées se tordent encore plus pour former un large sourire qui ne cesse de grandir... jusqu'à ce que sa peau se déchire dans un grand craquement, révélant des rangs entiers de dents acérées.{/n} « K'ho mr'dash'ng ro fnagl hept ! » {n}Une voix gutturale dénaturée émane de la gorge de la créature, qui pousse ensuite un grognement ressemblant à un éclat de rire.{/n}
traits.speaker: HaloDevice_Noble

languages.text: {n}Die Lider der Kreatur flattern auf. Das unnatürliche Leuchten ihrer gelben Pupillen versengt dich. Die entstellten Lippen verzerren sich, das Grinsen wird immer breiter und breiter ... Bis die dünne Haut mit einem scharfen Knall reißt und Reihe um Reihe spitzer Zähne preisgibt.{/n} "K'ho mr'dash'ng ro fnagl hept!" {n}Eine verzerrte, kehlige Stimme ertönt aus dem Mund der Kreatur, sie brüllt vor Lachen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The creature's eyelids flutter open, searing you with the unnatural glow of its yellow pupils. The disfigured lips twist, stretching the smile wider and wider... Until the thin skin bursts with a sharp snap, revealing row after row of pointed teeth.{/n} "K'ho mr'dash'ng ro fnagl hept!" {n}A twisted, guttural voice bursts from the creature's throat, and it roars with laughter.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Lider der Kreatur flattern auf. Das unnatürliche Leuchten ihrer gelben Pupillen versengt dich. Die entstellten Lippen verzerren sich, das Grinsen wird immer breiter und breiter ... Bis die dünne Haut mit einem scharfen Knall reißt und Reihe um Reihe spitzer Zähne preisgibt.{/n} "K'ho mr'dash'ng ro fnagl hept!" {n}Eine verzerrte, kehlige Stimme ertönt aus dem Mund der Kreatur, sie brüllt vor Lachen.{/n}
traits.speaker: HaloDevice_Noble

languages.text: {n}Yaratığın göz kapaklarının çırpınarak açılmasıyla sarı göz bebekleri, gayritabii parıltılarıyla seni kavuruyor. Biçimi bozulmuş dudakları bükülüyor, gittikçe daha da geniş gülümsemeye başlıyor... Ardından da keskin bir çat sesiyle ince derisi çatlayarak sıra sıra dizilmiş keskin dişlerini açığa çıkarıyor.{/n} "K'ho mr'dash'ng ro fnagl hept!" {n}Yaratığın gırtlağından çarpık ve boğuk bir ses çıkıyor. Uğultuyla kahkaha atmaya başlıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The creature's eyelids flutter open, searing you with the unnatural glow of its yellow pupils. The disfigured lips twist, stretching the smile wider and wider... Until the thin skin bursts with a sharp snap, revealing row after row of pointed teeth.{/n} "K'ho mr'dash'ng ro fnagl hept!" {n}A twisted, guttural voice bursts from the creature's throat, and it roars with laughter.{/n}
